metadata.title: Reggie - Spoiler-Free NBA Guide
metadata.description: Find out which NBA games are worth watching, spoiler-free. Pre and post-game analysis for basketball fans.

teams.title: NBA Teams
teams.pageDescription: Explore all NBA teams and their game analyses on Reggie.

methodology.title: How it works
methodology.intro: Reggie analyzes every NBA game to tell you which ones are truly worth watching, without ever spoiling the result.

prematch.title: Pre-game Analysis
prematch.subtitle: Before the game, we evaluate its potential on 3 criteria:

stakes.label: Stakes
stakes.description: Impact on standings, historic rivalries, importance of the matchup.

stars.label: Star Power
stars.description: Presence of star players and quality of expected matchups.

form.label: Recent Form
form.description: Team momentum over the last 10 games.

postmatch.title: Post-game Analysis
postmatch.subtitle: After the game, we evaluate what actually happened:

stakes.label: Stakes
stakes.description: Confirmed context and importance of the game.

methodology.footer: Scores range from 0 to 100. Above 80 is epic. Between 70-80 is a must watch. Between 50-70 is worth it. Below 50, you can skip.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Learn how Reggie protects your personal data on the website and mobile app.
privacy.intro: Reggie is a service that helps you discover which NBA games are worth watching, spoiler-free. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information on our website and mobile app.

website.title: Website (reggie.app)
website.theme: Theme preference (light/dark) - stored locally in your browser
website.language: Language preference - stored locally in your browser

mobile.title: Mobile App
mobile.favoriteTeam: Favorite team - stored locally on your device
mobile.theme: Theme preference (light/dark) - stored locally on your device
mobile.language: Language preference - stored locally on your device
mobile.systemLanguage: Device system language - automatically detected to set default language

dataNotCollected.title: Data We Do NOT Collect
dataNotCollected.personalInfo: No personal information (name, email, phone, address)

cookies.title: Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.website: Website: We do not use any cookies (functional, analytical, or advertising).
cookies.mobile: Mobile App: No cookies. Local storage only uses AsyncStorage for your preferences.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.supabase: Hosts public NBA data (games, teams, analyses, standings). No personal user data is stored on Supabase.
thirdParty.expo: Build and deployment service for the mobile app. No user data is transmitted to Expo.

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis for Processing (GDPR)
legalBasis.legitimateInterest: Legitimate interest for the operation of services
legalBasis.consent: Implicit consent for local preferences (theme, language, favorite team)

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.preferences: Local preferences: retained until you delete them or uninstall the app
dataRetention.nbaData: NBA data: maintained for service operation (public data)

userRights.title: Your Rights (GDPR)
userRights.intro: Under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the following rights:
userRights.note: Since we do not collect any personal data, these rights apply only to preferences stored locally on your device, which you can delete directly through your browser or app settings.

security.title: Security
security.https: All communications are encrypted via HTTPS
security.localStorage: Local storage uses your device's secure mechanisms
security.noTransmission: No personal data is transmitted to our servers

minors.title: Children
minors.content: Our services are accessible to all ages. We do not collect data specific to children, nor any personal data in general.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Significant changes will be indicated by updating the date at the top of this page.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For any questions regarding this privacy policy or your data, you can contact us:
